form.name: [HR] DD Forms Showcase - Onboarding: Re-use equipment

fields.name: Re use and existing computer
fields.description: We are going to re-allocate an existing PC/Notebook to the new user

fields.name: Whose existing computer will this user get.
Is data to be archived from the existing PC/Notebook
fields.description: Note that we backup the entire existing PC/Notebook using imaging if required. Imaging will back up *everything* but will require IT support to recover. If this is not necessary you may request some data/programs or all data/programs be maintained.

choices.name: Backup Some Files (you can describe these later)

fields.name: What files should be backed up?
